name: camisole
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a light piece of clothing that covers the top part of the body, with thin straps that go over the shoulders, usually worn by women under other clothes: I wore a soft camisole under my shirt. For her lunch date she chose a silk camisole and a pair of cool white cotton trousers.
mawielobob/iStock / Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
